extendedInfo.description: Add the scariest Halloween app ever created to your phone! Trick or Treat is a Halloween sound machine that plays scary sounds. Select from 35 different sounds played randomly at a customizable interval. Layering option included, which allows sound effects to mix together. Use it as a sound machine by the door on Halloween when handing out candy or just to scare your friends and family!Halloween will never be the same again...ghost,haunted,goblins,scream,halloween

reviews.comment: This app is perfect for Halloween! Can\'t wait! :)
reviews.author: A Google User
